mapper.select: select o.orders_seq,order_bookList_count,book_bigimgURL,order_bookList_seq,order_bookList_count*book_price as sum,book_title,orders_status from orders as o join order_bookList as b on o.orders_seq=b.orders_seq join book bo on b.book_seq=bo.book_seq where b.order_bookList_seq=#{order_bookList_seq}
